inputs.name: ScheduledTaskName
inputs.label: Scheduled Task Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Scheduled Task to uninstall from the server(s).

inputs.name: ComputerNames
inputs.label: Computer Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-separated list of computers to connect to and remove the Scheduled Task from. Leave blank to have it run on the agent's local computer.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username to use when connecting to the computers and removing the Scheduled Task. Leave blank to use the identity that the agent is running as.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to use when connecting to the computers and removing the Scheduled Task. As a best practice, a secret variable should be passed in here so that other users cannot see the password in plain text. Leave blank to use the identity that the agent is running as.
